code: import React from"react";import GaugeChart from"react-gauge-chart";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const GaugeComponent=_ref=>{let{value}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{width:"300px"},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GaugeChart,{id:"fluency-gauge",nrOfLevels:30,colors:["#FF5F6D","#FFC371","#00FF00"],arcWidth:0.3,percent:value/100,textColor:"#000000",formatTextValue:val=>"".concat(value," Wpm")})});};export default GaugeComponent;
